keyMoments.title: Learning of Robin's Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: The crew learns that Robin has sacrificed herself to protect them from the World Government, motivating their determination to rescue her.
keyMoments.significance: This moment unifies the crew's resolve and sets the stage for the Enies Lobby assault.

keyMoments.title: Escaping the Aqua Laguna
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats narrowly escape the devastating Aqua Laguna with Paulie's help, despite being trapped and separated.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's resilience and ability to survive extreme natural disasters.

keyMoments.title: Commitment to Rescue Robin
keyMoments.description: Luffy declares they will rescue Robin immediately, with the entire crew unified in this mission.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the Straw Hats' assault on a World Government stronghold.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Spandam Awaits Robin's Arrival
keyMoments.description: CP9's chief Spandam is shown at Enies Lobby with Funkfreed, eagerly awaiting the delivery of Robin and Franky by CP9 agents.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes CP9's anticipation and the stakes of the coming confrontation.

jollyRoger.description: CP9 has no jolly roger as they are a secret government organization

keyMoments.title: Paulie Rescues the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Paulie, representing Galley-La Company, uses his rope abilities to save the Straw Hats from the Aqua Laguna, demonstrating the alliance between the organizations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Galley-La's support for the Straw Hats' mission to rescue Robin.

jollyRoger.description: Galley-La Company logo, not a jolly roger
